nodes.text: The Whitesun family was a family that lived on the planet Tatooine. For three generations as of the Clone Wars they had been moisture farmers and were known as the best of them in the area around Mos Eisley.
The Whitesun family bloodline included the siblings Beru, Dama, Haro, and perhaps Coolie.

When Anakin Skywalker became Darth Vader, his son, Luke Skywalker, was cared for by Beru and her husband, Owen Lars. Owen and Beru, whom Luke called "Uncle Owen" and "Aunt Beru," were killed by Imperial stormtroopers in 0 BBY.
The name Whitesun originally appears in a similar form as the surname of Clieg Whitsun in the rough draft of the original film.
